hero.title: Your Perfect Resume in Minutes
hero.description: Create personalized and optimized resumes for each job application with the help of artificial intelligence.

about.title: What is TailorCV?
about.description: The intelligent platform that helps you create personalized resumes for each job application.
about.missionDescription: TailorCV was created with a simple goal: to optimize the job application process and significantly increase your chances of getting interviews.
about.mission1: Simplify the creation of personalized resumes
about.mission3: Save valuable time in your search
about.featuresDescription: Our features are designed to optimize your job search

features.customResumesDesc: Generate tailored resumes that match the specific job requirements, increasing your chances of being noticed.
features.aiAnalysisDesc: Our advanced AI analyzes job descriptions to identify key skills and qualifications that employers are looking for.
features.optimizedProcessDesc: Save time and effort by automating the resume customization process for each application.
features.successRateDesc: Stand out among other candidates with a resume that perfectly aligns with what recruiters are looking for.

about.ctaDescription: Start creating optimized resumes and increase your chances of getting interviews.

howItWorks.title: How TailorCV Works
howItWorks.description: A simple and effective process to help you land more interviews
howItWorks.step1Description: Our AI analyzes job descriptions and identifies:
howItWorks.step2Description: Our AI customizes your resume to match job requirements:
howItWorks.step2Feature3: Adjusts language to match company culture
howItWorks.step3Description: Our AI ensures your resume passes all tests:
howItWorks.step3Feature3: Action verb suggestions for each industry

benefits.title: Why choose TailorCV?
benefits.description: Our platform gives you the competitive edge in today's job market.

benefit1.title: Get 4x more interviews
benefit1.description: Our optimized resumes have been proven to increase interview callback rates by 400%.

benefit2.title: Save 10 hours/week
benefit2.description: Stop manually editing your resume for each application. Our AI does it in minutes.

benefit3.title: Adaptable profiles
benefit3.description: Customize your resume for different industries and regions with a single click.

benefit4.title: One-click updates
benefit4.description: Keep your resume up-to-date with instant synchronization across all versions.

default.name: John Smith
default.title: Senior Graphic Designer
default.summary: Graphic designer with over 5 years of experience, specializing in branding creation, digital illustration, and design of advertising campaigns. Advanced knowledge of Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop, with a portfolio that demonstrates creativity and attention to detail.

senior.title: Senior Graphic Designer
senior.responsibility1: Redesigned branding for 10+ clients, increasing recognition by 30%
senior.responsibility2: Developed style guides and design systems for global brands

junior.title: Junior Graphic Designer
junior.responsibility1: Designed promotional materials for social media and print media
